data.name: 东方夜雀食堂DLC扩展包 - 爱乐者的挑战赛！
data.detailed_description:
This DLC expands upon the rhythm mini-game during business


For players who aren't satisfied with only hitting notes in small sections at a time, this DLC is for you.



-------------------

An all-new rhythm game expansion!


——A godess who loves music sent Mystia a letter, she plans on expanding melodic activities around Gensokyo. All music lovers who reply will receive a test model of her rhythm arcade machine...!

We've turned the "Sparrow Tune" mini-game into a separate game session. In this gamemode, players can now strum the beats of all the songs they hear during business at the izakaya, and complete them from beginning to end.



The songs are grouped according to map spots, such as Youkai Trail, the Human Village, the Hakurei Shrine, etc... completing all three tracks at a spot unlocks the next.

All the izakaya sound tracks (includes the one from all other DLCs) are available in this DLC as well. Songs from future DLCs are also planned to be added.

So available in this DLC are a total of...33 songs for now!

Additionally, each time a spot is completed, a Musical Medal for will be awarded and decorated in Mystia's notebook. This fine and lovely badge symbolizes your effort and musical achievements.



Collect all the Medals, and gain the godess's approval!

We hope all players who enjoy music are able to have some fun in this DLC!!
data.about_the_game:
This DLC expands upon the rhythm mini-game during business


For players who aren't satisfied with only hitting notes in small sections at a time, this DLC is for you.



-------------------

An all-new rhythm game expansion!


——A godess who loves music sent Mystia a letter, she plans on expanding melodic activities around Gensokyo. All music lovers who reply will receive a test model of her rhythm arcade machine...!

We've turned the "Sparrow Tune" mini-game into a separate game session. In this gamemode, players can now strum the beats of all the songs they hear during business at the izakaya, and complete them from beginning to end.



The songs are grouped according to map spots, such as Youkai Trail, the Human Village, the Hakurei Shrine, etc... completing all three tracks at a spot unlocks the next.

All the izakaya sound tracks (includes the one from all other DLCs) are available in this DLC as well. Songs from future DLCs are also planned to be added.

So available in this DLC are a total of...33 songs for now!

Additionally, each time a spot is completed, a Musical Medal for will be awarded and decorated in Mystia's notebook. This fine and lovely badge symbolizes your effort and musical achievements.



Collect all the Medals, and gain the godess's approval!

We hope all players who enjoy music are able to have some fun in this DLC!!
data.short_description: This DLC is an expansion of the "Sparrow Tune" mini-game, it lets players fully play through each of the game's songs, each with different difficulties. This is a small love letter for players who, like us, love music and rhythm games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5500 / Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750Ti / AMD HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7&Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OC
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Graphic Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal Sound Card
  • Additional Notes:
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OC
  • Processor: 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1G Graphic Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal Sound Card
  • Additional Notes:
